      • removeOccupied

        Removes an occupied space resulting in an unoccupied space Returns early if space is already unoccupied

        screenY - the y-coordinate of the screen coordinate

      • roundToCeilingOfHundred

        public int roundToCeilingOfHundred(int x)
        Rounds coordinates given to the ceiling by 100, unless the number is perfectly divisible by 100 Ex) 544 ----> 600 238 ----> 300 20 -----> 100 500 ----> 500
        Parameters:
        x - number to be rounded
        Returns:
        the resulting number
